um: for the sake of the environment!
product: Whether in production, in the offices or in our branches. We only work with green eco-electricity from renewable energy sources. This enables us to achieve an almost climate-neutral production.
ueb: We firmly believe that the local suppliers are the best. Therefore we only get all materials from sources within a radius of 50 KM.
fsc: Our products have all been awarded the FSC seal. This confirms us on our way and drives us to continue working on ourselves.
